about_the_game:
Embark on a thrilling journey as a space mercenary! Customize your ships with powerful weapons and modules, choose contracts and destinations, and battle enemy fleets and epic bosses. Your decisions shape the universe around you, so forge your path in this action-packed space shooter!

Your career, your decisions

You're a mercenary: decide on what to do next. Explore a new sector, shop for new items, accept contract missions or participate in global conflicts between factions.

You have an impact

Your actions matter: gain or lose reputation with the factions in space, help the factions (or not) to expand their control, or go rogue and only focus on your own interests.

Fast-paced and strategic shooter

Fight in a fast-paced action shooter: battle waves of enemies, avoid incoming bullets and obstacles, and strategize on what weapon to use depending on the challenge you're facing!

Prepare your loadout

Customize your spaceship with tens of equipments to refine your strategy depending on the next mission.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Dual core AMD or Intel processor @ 3.0 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 950, AMD R9 280 or newer
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
